__e: I know it sounds crazy, but Megan, I've seen things that I can't explain.

I really thought that you got your heart broken, and your bank account emptied.
I'm sorry. Megan can be a little adamant, you know, sometimes about these things.
Well, you know, Megan's in town, and I thought that, uh, well, maybe....
